name: Enterprise Test Server Declaration Generator File

description: DGE files are typically created when a user enters specifications in the Declaration Generator window in Enterprise Test Server and clicks SAVE AS . The files may also be created using a text editor and renaming the ".txt" extension of a .TXT file to ".dge".
